name: Gaia Online Enhancer Plus
description: Important: Click the "Show CSS Code" button first. The install button will work after that. I highly recommend this style that makes the "Show CSS Code" button much easier to find. ― This style will improve the new centered site that has been released by the developers, fixes most of the bugs to improve visual and your browsing experience and also bring back the old centered style. This will also remove and improve a few contents on the website. Please note that this is not yet compatible with the extension GaiaUpdates. Version: 1.1.8 | View change logs | View website

user.name: Hyokkuda
user.about: I am a hardcore gamer, completionist, creative & perfectionist. I like various anime in the style of Dragon Ball Z, Bleach & Sword Art Online. I love spicy food & vanilla stuff! Also I'm a web stylist. I started off on a community website called Gaia Online with CSS and CSS3 style language. I continued working on websites and designs and now here I am. I am trying to make a living on making websites and web styles like theses. I do not force anyone on donating, but it is most appreciated. ♥

additional_info: This style was created for the sole purpose of optimizing Gaia Online based on my preferences and a little bit on what people wanted to have on the website. Changes/Updates You can view the list of changes by clicking here.
